translations: 极大，庞大的数字（zillion 的复数）

sentences.sentence: There was a bunch of kids waiting and zillions of reporters.
sentences.translation: 有一群小孩在等着，还有无数记者。

sentences.sentence: I have zillions of books for you to borrow if you want.
sentences.translation: 我有无数本书，你要愿意的话都可以借给你。

sentences.sentence: Mr Jobs expected to sell "zillions" of his new machines.
sentences.translation: 乔布斯预期他的新机器能卖出“无数台”。
